adDetails: I am available for your special event or party. I have been Santa since 1978 for San Francisco Downtown stores such as at Macy's, Emporium, and special events for Unicef, Hamlin School, Stanford Court. I am currently at Campton Place Hotel and Macy's Union Square. I have been finger-printed by two State Agencies, drug tested and maintain two State licenses. Native San Franciscan and Father of five. Have a Great Holiday show contact info
